# Resources

- [Google Sheet for Calculations](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JlbNKfywLiXCCvRWS4Yf6zcKhIR8lPaUdWz_0RUTB94/edit#gid=1414078143)

Based on the excel, answers to most usual sigRSV breakeven questions are:

**Assuming other things stay at current (03/03/21) levels,**

- ERG price needs to go from 3.69$ to 4.2$  to make up the fees and start making more than by just holding ERG.

OR

- The contract needs to accumulate 35000 ERG in fees, to make up the sigRSV purchase/sell fees and start making more than by just holding ERG.

OR some combination like

- Price going up to 4$ and 12500 ERG collected as fees.
